titleStmt.title: Mr. St. Johns speech, or argument in Parliament; shewing, whether a man may be a judge, and a witnesse in the same cause. By way of preface, I shall return a distinction between a doubtfull and a scrupulous conscience.
titleStmt.author: St. John, Oliver, 1598?-1673.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
